member.summary: User ID of the suspicious user.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.PubSub.Models.Responses.Messages.LowTrustUsers.Treatment
member.summary: The treatment set for the suspicious user, can be NO_TREATMENT, ACTIVE_MONITORING, or RESTRICTED

member.name: P:TwitchLib.PubSub.Models.Responses.Messages.LowTrustUsers.Types
member.summary: User types (if any) that apply to the suspicious user, can be UNKNOWN_TYPE, MANUALLY_ADDED, DETECTED_BAN_EVADER, or BANNED_IN_SHARED_CHANNEL

member.name: P:TwitchLib.PubSub.Models.Responses.Messages.LowTrustUsers.BanEvasionEvaluation
member.summary: A ban evasion likelihood value (if any) that as been applied to the user automatically by Twitch, can be UNKNOWN_EVADER, UNLIKELY_EVADER, LIKELY_EVADER, or POSSIBLE_EVADER

member.name: P:TwitchLib.PubSub.Models.Responses.Messages.LowTrustUsers.EvaluatedAt
member.summary: If applicable, an DateTime timestamp for the first time the suspicious user was automatically evaluated by Twitch.
